vehicles.description: A large truck transporting a concrete mixer is directly in front of the ego car, occupying the center of the lane and partially obstructing the view ahead.
vehicles.explanation: Its size and the potential for slow movement or sudden stops make it a critical object to consider for safe driving decisions.

vulnerable_road_users.description: A motorcyclist is visible on the right side of the road ahead, slightly ahead of the ego car and traveling in the same direction.
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: The motorcyclist could change speed or direction, which requires careful observation to avoid a collision.

other objects.description: There is a road sign on the right side indicating a junction ahead and a dustbin by the curb.
other objects.explanation: These objects are not directly affecting the driving path but indicate nearby side roads and pedestrian areas that could introduce additional road users into the driving scene.

suggestions: Maintain a safe distance from the large truck in front, being prepared to adjust speed if the truck slows down or stops. Monitor the white commercial truck on the left to anticipate any lane changes. Keep an eye on the motorcyclist on the right for any sudden changes in their position or speed. No immediate lane changes are advised given the current traffic arrangement, but if overtaking is necessary, ensure clear space and signal appropriately. Remain vigilant of the traffic scenario as a whole to adjust plans according to the evolving situation on the road.
